Articles.Content: We need a contrasting background between posts so they don't blend together, don't you agree guys?

11 hours ago, Mr Shifty said:

To that end, it might be smart to make a thread here or somewhere else prominent with an OP that notes community complaints about the forums, contains information and updates about whether and when those concerns will be addressed, and provides a forum for suggestions in the thread. That seems simple to me, and I'm not sure why it hasn't been implemented.

It has been, but since it's being neglected at the moment, please see here.

 

Do NOT drag arguments and discussions into that thread. Keep it neat and tidy, so it's easy to read.

As some people don't believe that "further non-constructive complaints in this thread will be removed" applies to them I am closing this thread.

Refer to the previous devnotes for reasons why we are now on IPS.

The activity stream "threads I follow" still bugs me - there needs to be an option to just show me the thread topics which have unread updates, without repeating the topic in the list multiple times if there are multiple new messages.

Still not happy about inter-line spacing, or the amount of wasted gutter whitespace.
